author: sonic.1337
content:
Hello, I have updated my execution layer client distribution info page. <https://supermajority.info/>

1. There is still a lot of data missing. I have done my best, but some services are pretty resistant about revealing their client usage.
2. Every reported dataset includes a source link, so it can be verified. The data is always lagging behind a little bit, of course. (Lido didn't publish their Q4 data yet, for example.)
3. It's open source <https://github.com/one-three-three-seven/Supermajority>
